rt.intersectables

Class CSGPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.intersectables.CSGSolid
      • rt.intersectables.CSGPlane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Intersectable

    public class CSGPlane
extends CSGSolid
    A plane for CSG operations. The plane represents a solid that fills a whole half-space. The plane normal is assumed to point into the empty half-space, and the plane occupies the half-space opposite of the normal.

    • Nested Class Summary
